tool_description: With this API, information can be read from the Laserforce database, such as the games played, the game modes played and the scores achieved.
name: Laserforce Statistics
title: Laserforce Statistics

api_list.name: Member Details
api_list.description: With this endpoint you can find member information about a specific player.

api_list.name: Recent Missions
api_list.description: With this endpoint you can view a player's last 30 missions.

api_list.name: Last 5 Recent Missions
api_list.description: With this endpoint you can view a player's last 5 missions.
